acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.description: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisioned tonight, you die.
acrobat.other_night_desc: The acrobat chooses a player. If they were poisoned or drunk at dusk, or are poisoned or drunk, the Arcobat dies.

alchemist.name: Alchemist
alchemist.description: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.
alchemist.first_night_desc: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token

alhadikhia.name: Al-Hadikhia
alhadikhia.description: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
alhadikhia.other_night_desc: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

alsaahir.name: Alsaahir
alsaahir.description: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

amnesiac.name: Amnesiac
amnesiac.description: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
amnesiac.first_night_desc: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
amnesiac.other_night_desc: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

angel.name: Angel
angel.description: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.

apprentice.name: Apprentice
apprentice.description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).
apprentice.first_night_desc: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.

artist.name: Artist
artist.description: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
assassin.other_night_desc: If the Assassin has not yet used their ability: The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

atheist.name: Atheist
atheist.description: The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

balloonist.name: Balloonist
balloonist.description: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]
balloonist.first_night_desc: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
balloonist.other_night_desc: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.description: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

barber.name: Barber
barber.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
barber.other_night_desc: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.

barista.name: Barista
barista.description: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy & gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
barista.first_night_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
barista.other_night_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

baron.name: Baron
baron.description: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

beggar.name: Beggar
beggar.description: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober and healthy.

bishop.name: Bishop
bishop.description: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.

boffin.name: Boffin
boffin.description: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.
boffin.first_night_desc: Wake the Boffin and the Demon. Show them the the token of the good character that the Demon has the ability of.

bonecollector.name: Bone Collector
bonecollector.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
bonecollector.other_night_desc: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)

boomdandy.name: Boomdandy
boomdandy.description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.

bootlegger.name: Bootlegger
bootlegger.description: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter
bountyhunter.description: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
bountyhunter.first_night_desc: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
bountyhunter.other_night_desc: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.

buddhist.name: Buddhist
buddhist.description: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.

bureaucrat.name: Bureaucrat
bureaucrat.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
bureaucrat.first_night_desc: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
bureaucrat.other_night_desc: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

butcher.name: Butcher
butcher.description: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

butler.name: Butler
butler.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
butler.first_night_desc: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
butler.other_night_desc: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

cannibal.name: Cannibal
cannibal.description: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
cannibal.other_night_desc: If someone good was executed today, the cannibal has their ability. If the executee was evil they are poisoned. Cannibal goes where the executee was in the night order.

cerenovus.name: Cerenovus
cerenovus.description: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
cerenovus.first_night_desc: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
cerenovus.other_night_desc: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.

chambermaid.name: Chambermaid
chambermaid.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
chambermaid.first_night_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
chambermaid.other_night_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

chef.name: Chef
chef.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
chef.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.

choirboy.name: Choirboy
choirboy.description: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]
choirboy.other_night_desc: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.

clockmaker.name: Clockmaker
clockmaker.description: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
clockmaker.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

courtier.name: Courtier
courtier.description: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
courtier.first_night_desc: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
courtier.other_night_desc: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

cultleader.name: Cult Leader
cultleader.description: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
cultleader.first_night_desc: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
cultleader.other_night_desc: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.

damsel.name: Damsel
damsel.description: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
damsel.first_night_desc: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
damsel.other_night_desc: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

deviant.name: Deviant
deviant.description: If you were funny today, you can not be exiled.

devilsadvocate.name: Devil's Advocate
devilsadvocate.description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
devilsadvocate.first_night_desc: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
devilsadvocate.other_night_desc: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.

djinn.name: Djinn
djinn.description: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

doomsayer.name: Doomsayer
doomsayer.description: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
dreamer.first_night_desc: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
dreamer.other_night_desc: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

drunk.name: Drunk
drunk.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

duchess.name: Duchess
duchess.description: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.
duchess.other_night_desc: If three people visited you today wake each one at a time and tell them how many of thes who visited you are evil. One person gets false information.

empath.name: Empath
empath.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.
empath.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
empath.other_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.

engineer.name: Engineer
engineer.description: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
engineer.first_night_desc: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.
engineer.other_night_desc: The Engineer shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a Demon or points to the relevant number of Minions. If the Engineer chose characters, replace the Demon or Minions with the choices, then wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character tokens.

eviltwin.name: Evil Twin
eviltwin.description: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.
eviltwin.first_night_desc: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.

exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
exorcist.other_night_desc: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.

fanggu.name: Fang Gu
fanggu.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
fanggu.other_night_desc: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.

farmer.name: Farmer
farmer.description: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
farmer.other_night_desc: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.

fearmonger.name: Fearmonger
fearmonger.description: Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
fearmonger.first_night_desc: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
fearmonger.other_night_desc: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

ferryman.name: Ferryman
ferryman.description: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

fibbin.name: Fibbin
fibbin.description: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

fiddler.name: Fiddler
fiddler.description: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.

fisherman.name: Fisherman
fisherman.description: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.

flowergirl.name: Flowergirl
flowergirl.description: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
flowergirl.other_night_desc: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon not voted' marker (remove 'Demon voted', if any).

fool.name: Fool
fool.description: The first time you die, you don't.

fortuneteller.name: Fortune Teller
fortuneteller.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
fortuneteller.first_night_desc: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.
fortuneteller.other_night_desc: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.description: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
gambler.other_night_desc: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.

gangster.name: Gangster
gangster.description: Once per day, you may choose to kill a living neighbor, if your other living neighbor agrees.

gardener.name: Gardener
gardener.description: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.

general.name: General
general.description: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
general.first_night_desc: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
general.other_night_desc: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.

godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.description: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
godfather.first_night_desc: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
godfather.other_night_desc: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.

golem.name: Golem
golem.description: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

goon.name: Goon
goon.description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

gossip.name: Gossip
gossip.description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
gossip.other_night_desc: If the Gossip's public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.

grandmother.name: Grandmother
grandmother.description: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
grandmother.first_night_desc: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
grandmother.other_night_desc: If the Grandmother's grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight: The Grandmother dies.

gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.description: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

harlot.name: Harlot
harlot.description: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.
harlot.other_night_desc: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.

harpy.name: Harpy
harpy.description: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.
harpy.first_night_desc: Wake the Harpy. The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the "Mad" reminder and the second player with the "target" reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked "Mad". Show the "This Character Selected You" info screen with the Harpy token, then point to the player marked "2nd". Put the player marked "Mad" to sleep.
harpy.other_night_desc: Wake the Harpy. The Harpy points to one player, then another player. Mark the first player with the "Mad" reminder and the second player with the "target" reminder. Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the player marked "Mad". Show the "This Character Selected You" info screen with the Harpy token, then point to the player marked "2nd". Put the player marked "Mad" to sleep.

hatter.name: Hatter
hatter.description: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
hatter.first_night_desc: During that night, wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
hatter.other_night_desc: During that night, wake the Minions and Demon. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.

hellslibrarian.name: Hell's Librarian
hellslibrarian.description: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.

heretic.name: Heretic
heretic.description: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

highpriestess.name: High Priestess
highpriestess.description: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.
highpriestess.first_night_desc: Wake the High Priestess. Point to a player.
highpriestess.other_night_desc: Wake the High Priestess. Point to a player.

huntsman.name: Huntsman
huntsman.description: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
huntsman.first_night_desc: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
huntsman.other_night_desc: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.

imp.name: Imp
imp.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
imp.other_night_desc: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.

innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
innkeeper.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
innkeeper.other_night_desc: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.

investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
investigator.first_night_desc: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

judge.name: Judge
judge.description: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

juggler.name: Juggler
juggler.description: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.
juggler.other_night_desc: If today was the Juggler's first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.

kazali.name: Kazali
kazali.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You choose which players are which Minions.
kazali.first_night_desc: Wake the Kazali and allow them to pick two players and their new minion roles
kazali.other_night_desc: Wake the Kazali and allow them to pick one player, they die

king.name: King
king.description: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.
king.first_night_desc: Wake the Demon, show them the 'This character selected you' card, show the King token and point to the King player.
king.other_night_desc: If the number of dead players is greater than or equal to the number of living players, show the King a character token of a living player.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

knight.name: Knight
knight.description: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
knight.first_night_desc: Wake the Knight. Point to the two players marked "Know"

legion.name: Legion
legion.description: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
legion.other_night_desc: Choose a player, that player dies.

leviathan.name: Leviathan
leviathan.description: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
leviathan.first_night_desc: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
leviathan.other_night_desc: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play', and the current day.

librarian.name: Librarian
librarian.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
librarian.first_night_desc: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

lilmonsta.name: Lil' Monsta
lilmonsta.description: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta & 'is the Demon'. Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]
lilmonsta.first_night_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
lilmonsta.other_night_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.

lleech.name: Lleech
lleech.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.
lleech.first_night_desc: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.
lleech.other_night_desc: The Lleech points to a player. That player dies.

lordoftyphon.name: Lord of Typhon
lordoftyphon.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]
lordoftyphon.first_night_desc: wake the appropriate number of players directly clockwise and counter-clockwise from the Lord of Typhon. Show each of these players a unique Minion token, and tell them that they are evil.
lordoftyphon.other_night_desc: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.

lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
lunatic.first_night_desc: If 7 or more players: Show the Lunatic a number of arbitrary 'Minions', players equal to the number of Minions in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary good characters. If the token received by the Lunatic is a Demon that would wake tonight: Allow the Lunatic to do the Demon actions. Place their 'attack' markers. Wake the Demon. Show the Demon's real character token. Show them the Lunatic player. If the Lunatic attacked players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
lunatic.other_night_desc: Allow the Lunatic to do the actions of the Demon. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Lunatic selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.

lycanthrope.name: Lycanthrope
lycanthrope.description: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn’t kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.
lycanthrope.first_night_desc: Mark a player with the Registers as Evil reminder.
lycanthrope.other_night_desc: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die. Run the demon's ability as normal. If the Lycanthrope killed, the demon's picks do not die.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
magician.first_night_desc: Include the Magician in the Minion and Demon info steps

marionette.name: Marionette
marionette.description: You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbour the Demon]
marionette.first_night_desc: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and place the Is the Marionette reminder token. Wake the Demon and show them the Marionette.

mastermind.name: Mastermind
mastermind.description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

mathematician.name: Mathematician
mathematician.description: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
mathematician.first_night_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
mathematician.other_night_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

matron.name: Matron
matron.description: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

mayor.name: Mayor
mayor.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

mezepheles.name: Mezepheles
mezepheles.description: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
mezepheles.first_night_desc: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.
mezepheles.other_night_desc: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

minstrel.name: Minstrel
minstrel.description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
monk.other_night_desc: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.

moonchild.name: Moonchild
moonchild.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
moonchild.other_night_desc: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.

mutant.name: Mutant
mutant.description: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

nightwatchman.name: Nightwatchman
nightwatchman.description: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.
nightwatchman.first_night_desc: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.
nightwatchman.other_night_desc: The Nightwatchman may point to a player. Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' card and the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman player.

nodashii.name: No Dashii
nodashii.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.
nodashii.other_night_desc: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.

noble.name: Noble
noble.description: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
noble.first_night_desc: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.

ogre.name: Ogre
ogre.description: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.
ogre.first_night_desc: Wake the Ogre and have them point to a player. If they pointed to an evil player, they become evil. Do not tell them their alignment

ojo.name: Ojo
ojo.description: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
ojo.other_night_desc: The Ojo player points to a character icon on their character sheet. If that character is in play, that player dies—mark them with the “Dead” reminder. If that character is not in play, choose some number of players. Those players die—mark them with the “Dead” reminder.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.
oracle.other_night_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of dead evil players.

organgrinder.name: Organ Grinder
organgrinder.description: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk or not.
organgrinder.first_night_desc: The Organ Grinder either nods or shakes their head. If they nod: mark them with the 'Drunk' reminder.
organgrinder.other_night_desc: The Organ Grinder either nods or shakes their head. If they nod: mark them with the 'Drunk' reminder.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.description: Executed good players might not die.

philosopher.name: Philosopher
philosopher.description: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
philosopher.first_night_desc: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
philosopher.other_night_desc: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.

pithag.name: Pit-Hag
pithag.description: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
pithag.other_night_desc: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.

pixie.name: Pixie
pixie.description: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.
pixie.first_night_desc: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.

plaguedoctor.name: Plague Doctor
plaguedoctor.description: If you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

po.name: Po
po.description: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
po.other_night_desc: If the Po chose no-one the previous night: The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die.

poisoner.name: Poisoner
poisoner.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
poisoner.first_night_desc: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
poisoner.other_night_desc: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.

politician.name: Politician
politician.description: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

poppygrower.name: Poppy Grower
poppygrower.description: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
poppygrower.first_night_desc: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are
poppygrower.other_night_desc: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.

preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.description: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
preacher.first_night_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
preacher.other_night_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.

professor.name: Professor
professor.description: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
professor.other_night_desc: If the Professor has not used their ability: The Professor either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

psychopath.name: Psychopath
psychopath.description: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

pukka.name: Pukka
pukka.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
pukka.first_night_desc: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.
pukka.other_night_desc: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.

puzzlemaster.name: Puzzlemaster
puzzlemaster.description: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

ravenkeeper.name: Ravenkeeper
ravenkeeper.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
ravenkeeper.other_night_desc: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight: The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player's character token.

recluse.name: Recluse
recluse.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

revolutionary.name: Revolutionary
revolutionary.description: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.

riot.name: Riot
riot.description: Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]

sage.name: Sage
sage.description: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
sage.other_night_desc: If the Sage was killed by a Demon: Point to two players, one of which is that Demon.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
sailor.first_night_desc: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
sailor.other_night_desc: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

saint.name: Saint
saint.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

savant.name: Savant
savant.description: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
scapegoat.description: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

scarletwoman.name: Scarlet Woman
scarletwoman.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)
scarletwoman.other_night_desc: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.

seamstress.name: Seamstress
seamstress.description: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
seamstress.first_night_desc: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
seamstress.other_night_desc: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.description: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

shugenja.name: Shugenja
shugenja.description: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
shugenja.first_night_desc: If the closest evil player is in a clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the closest evil player is in an anti-clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.

shabaloth.name: Shabaloth
shabaloth.description: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
shabaloth.other_night_desc: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

snakecharmer.name: Snake Charmer
snakecharmer.description: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
snakecharmer.first_night_desc: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
snakecharmer.other_night_desc: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

snitch.name: Snitch
snitch.first_night_desc: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.description: You are safe from the Demon.

spiritofivory.name: Spirit Of Ivory
spiritofivory.description: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

spy.name: Spy
spy.description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
spy.first_night_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
spy.other_night_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

steward.name: Steward
steward.first_night_desc: wake the Steward. Point to the player marked "Know"

stormcatcher.name: Storm Catcher
stormcatcher.description: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
stormcatcher.first_night_desc: When waking evil players show them "this character selected you" then the token of the known character

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.description: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
summoner.first_night_desc: Wake the Summoner and show them 3 characters that are not in play.
summoner.other_night_desc: If the Summoner has the Night 3 reminder, wake the Summoner and have them point to a player and a demon character. That player becomes the chosen demon and becomes evil.

sweetheart.name: Sweetheart
sweetheart.description: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
sweetheart.other_night_desc: Choose a player that is drunk.

tealady.name: Tea Lady
tealady.description: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
thief.first_night_desc: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
thief.other_night_desc: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.description: You might die at any time.

towncrier.name: Town Crier
towncrier.description: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
towncrier.other_night_desc: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).

toymaker.name: Toymaker
toymaker.description: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.

undertaker.name: Undertaker
undertaker.description: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
undertaker.other_night_desc: If a player was executed today: Show that player's character token.

vigormortis.name: Vigormortis
vigormortis.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [-1 Outsider]
vigormortis.other_night_desc: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.

villageidiot.name: Village Idiot
villageidiot.description: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
villageidiot.first_night_desc: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat until all Village Idiots have acted.
villageidiot.other_night_desc: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat until all Village Idiots have acted.

virgin.name: Virgin
virgin.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

vizier.name: Vizier
vizier.description: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
vizier.first_night_desc: Announce that the Vizier is in play.

vortox.name: Vortox
vortox.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
vortox.other_night_desc: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.

voudon.name: Voudon
voudon.description: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

washerwoman.name: Washerwoman
washerwoman.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
washerwoman.first_night_desc: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

widow.name: Widow
widow.description: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
widow.first_night_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Widow character token.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
witch.first_night_desc: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
witch.other_night_desc: If there are 4 or more players alive: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

yaggababble.name: Yaggababble
yaggababble.description: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
yaggababble.first_night_desc: Wake the Yaggababble and show them their secret phrase.
yaggababble.other_night_desc: Kill a number of players that is less than or equal to the number of times the Yaggababble said their phrase publicly during the day. You choose which players die.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.description: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

zombuul.name: Zombuul
zombuul.description: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
zombuul.other_night_desc: If no-one died during the day: The Zombuul points to a player. That player dies.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.description: You start knowing which evil characters are in-play.
scholar.first_night_desc: Show each of the evil tokens in play.

auditor.name: Auditor
auditor.description: You start knowing how many players have abilities affecting set up. [No default Outsiders]
auditor.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of players that have abilities affecting set up.

governess.name: Governess
governess.description: You start knowing one character type of the closest non-Townsfolk (not including Travellers).
governess.first_night_desc: Show the Governess one character type of the closest non-Townsfolk (not including Travellers).

diplomat.name: Diplomat
diplomat.description: You start knowing which players are minions. If a minion you know is executed, your team loses, even if dead.
diplomat.first_night_desc: Show the Governess which players are minions.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: You start knowing how many outsiders are in play. All outsiders are drunk, even if you are dead. [+1 Outsider]
blacksmith.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of outsiders in play.

ballerina.name: Ballerina
ballerina.description: You start knowing if more townsfolk are (1) odd or (2) even steps from you clockwise. Or you learn that (3) it's equal.
ballerina.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (1,2,3) if more townsfolk are (1) odd, (2) even, or (3) even steps from the Ballerina in the clockwise direction.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.description: You start knowing how many pirates are in-play. If Pirates are the only good characters alive, good wins. [+0 to +2 Pirates]
pirate.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of pirates in play.

prophet.name: Prophet
prophet.description: On your 1st night, choose a day number: if all dead players are good that dawn, they are resurrected as travellers.
prophet.first_night_desc: The Moneylender chooses a number, record it.
prophet.other_night_desc: If this was the day chosen and all dead players are good, ressurect them as travellers.

stableboy.name: Stableboy
stableboy.first_night_desc: Show the Stableboy the token of one in play character.
stableboy.other_night_desc: Show the Stableboy the token of one different in play character.

moneylender.name: Moneylender
moneylender.description: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself): you become their alignment.
moneylender.first_night_desc: The Moneylender points to a player. If the Moneylender changes alignment show the Moneylender the 'you are' card a thumbs up if they are good and thumbs down if they are evil.
moneylender.other_night_desc: The Moneylender points to a player. If the Moneylender changes alignment show the Moneylender the 'you are' card a thumbs up if they are good and thumbs down if they are evil.

palmreader.name: Palm Reader
palmreader.description: The Demon attacks one night before it takes effect, even if you are dead. Each night, learn who was attacked.
palmreader.first_night_desc: If the demon attacked a player, mark the player as 'attacked' point to the marked player or shake you're head 'no' to show no one was attacked.
palmreader.other_night_desc: Kill the previously marked player if there is one. If the demon attacked a player, mark the player as 'attacked' point to the marked player or shake you're head 'no' to show no one was attacked.

wench.name: Wench
wench.description: Each night, you learn a player. They are drunk until dusk and any information they receive is false.
wench.first_night_desc: Mark a player as 'drunk' and show the Wench the drunk player.
wench.other_night_desc: Mark a player as 'drunk' and show the Wench the drunk player.

houndskeeper.name: Houndskeeper
houndskeeper.description: Each night, you learn how many steps to the nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight.
houndskeeper.first_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps the Houndskeeper is from their nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight. 0 if no one was targetted.
houndskeeper.other_night_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of steps the Houndskeeper is from their nearest living player targeted by an evil ability tonight. 0 if no one was targetted.

genius.name: Genius
genius.description: Each night, choose a good character: you have that ability until you choose again. You are drunk every other night.
genius.first_night_desc: The Genius picks a player, they have their ability.
genius.other_night_desc: If the genius was drunk from their ability the previous night, make them sober, otherwise mark them with the 'drunk' token, The Genius picks a player, they have their ability.

quack.name: Quack
quack.description: Each night, choose 2 living players: abilities that target one, target the other instead. The demon cannot die this way.
quack.first_night_desc: The Quack points to two alive players, mark them with the 'chosen' token. Abilities that target one target the other.
quack.other_night_desc: The Quack points to two alive players, mark them with the 'chosen' token. Abilities that target one target the other.

witchhunter.name: Witch Hunter
witchhunter.description: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. If they are not executed tomorrow, they turn evil. You can not be evil.
witchhunter.first_night_desc: The Witch Hunter points to a player. Show thumbs or down to show the Witch Hunter their alignment. Mark the player as 'chosen'.
witchhunter.other_night_desc: If the player marked as chosen was not executed, their alignment becomes Evil. The Witch Hunter points to a player. Show thumbs or down to show the Witch Hunter their alignment. Mark the player as 'chosen'.

insomniac.name: Insomniac
insomniac.description: Each night*, learn a character that died tonight.
insomniac.other_night_desc: Show the Insomniac the character token of a player that died tonight.

voyeur.name: Voyeur
voyeur.description: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): if they die tonight, all players learn who you are.
voyeur.other_night_desc: The Voyeur choses a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

hustler.name: Hustler
hustler.description: Each night*, learn the character that nominated you today. If you are 'mad' about being the Hustler, you receive false info.
hustler.other_night_desc: Show the Hustler the character token of who they nominated today. If they were 'mad' about being the Hustler, they receive false info.

astrologer.name: Astrologer
astrologer.description: Each day, ask the Storyteller to tell you 1 piece of false information.

matchmaker.name: Matchmaker
matchmaker.description: Each day, privately choose 2 players: you learn if they're connected by an active ability.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Each day, you may publicly choose a player. If either of you die tonight, an alive minion dies instead, if possible.

coachman.name: Coachman
coachman.description: Each day, choose a 1 word topic on which the Storyteller tells you 1 fact. If an alive neighbour is evil, you get false info.

thespian.name: Thespian
thespian.description: Each day, an evil player must be 'mad' about something or they die. Each day, you must be 'mad' about something or you die.

apothecary.name: Apothecary
apothecary.description: Once per game, publicly change one game rule, if the Storyteller agrees.

patient.name: Patient
patient.description: Once per game, at night, you wake: choose an in-play character to gain ability for each night you were asleep.
patient.first_night_desc: Choose a night for patient to wake up.
patient.other_night_desc: If this is the night the patient wakes up, the Patient points to a player, they gain their ability for each night they were not waken up.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
bodyguard.description: Once per game, at night, choose a character (not the Bodyguard): they are not affected in any way by evil abilities.
bodyguard.first_night_desc: Show the Bodyguard the 'use your ability?' card. If the Bodyguard choses a character mark that player as 'safe'.
bodyguard.other_night_desc: Show the Bodyguard the 'use your ability?' card. If the Bodyguard choses a character mark that player as 'safe'.

hangman.name: Hangman
hangman.description: Once per game, choose a player. Going clockwise, good players that do not publicly state their character in 3 seconds, die.

piper.name: Piper
piper.description: Once per game, publicly choose that from now on: Minions can privately choose to turn good but the next executee's team loses.

machinist.name: Machinist
machinist.description: On your 1st day, you may visit the Storyteller to gain the ability of an off-script character, even if drunk or poisoned.

leper.name: Leper
leper.description: If the demon kills you, they are drunk.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.description: On final day, if dead, you are raised as a not-in-play townsfolk. You are sober and healthy.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description: If both your neighbors die, something good happens.

nun.name: Nun
nun.description: Other good players cannot be drunk, poisoned or get false info.

bonvivant.name: Bon Vivant
bonvivant.description: Your alive neighbouring players are drunk (not including Travelers).

nanny.name: Nanny
nanny.description: At night, other players with both hands over their eyes cannot die, but if you die, they might die too.
nanny.first_night_desc: If the Nanny died, kill any other players with their hands over their eyes.
nanny.other_night_desc: If the Nanny died, kill any other players with their hands over their eyes.

liontamer.name: Lion Tamer
liontamer.description: If either of your alive neighbours died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.
liontamer.other_night_desc: If either of the Lion Tamer's alive neighbours died by execution today, all players are safe from the Demon tonight.

schoolmarm.name: Schoolmarm
schoolmarm.description: Players who turn evil learn you are in play and may choose to remain good. [1 evil-creating character is in-play]
schoolmarm.first_night_desc: If a player turned evil, wake them and inform them of the Schoolmarm and offer them to remain good.
schoolmarm.other_night_desc: If a player turned evil, wake them and inform them of the Schoolmarm and offer them to remain good.

strongman.name: Strongman
strongman.description: If you were the most mad about being the Strongman today & a player chose you tonight for any reason, they die.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.description: On the final night, even if you are dead, choose a player: they learn something. At any time, you may request what.

prince.name: Prince
prince.description: After the first night, as long as you haven't been nominated, you cannot die, turn evil, or become another character.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: You may choose to break any rules when alive. If the Storyteller finds out, even if dead, something bad might happen.

tycoon.name: Tycoon
tycoon.description: 1 player that you have shaken hands with might be drunk. Each night*, learn if you shook hands with an evil player today.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.description: You & any other player may choose to make a deal. Until a new deal is made, if a player breaks the deal, 1 of you dies.

queen.name: Queen
queen.description: If both of your neighbours are good, they learn who you are. Anyone mad about a Queen being in-play might be executed.

mole.name: Mole
mole.description: You are a minion & register as evil. If the Demon publicly guesses you (once), your team loses, even if dead, drunk or poisoned.

beekeeper.name: Beekeeper
beekeeper.description: One evil player registers as good and as a Townsfolk or Outsider. If you publicly guess who it is (once per game), your team wins.

casanova.name: Casanova
casanova.description: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself). If they're an ally & executed tomorrow your team loses.
casanova.first_night_desc: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.
casanova.other_night_desc: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

bully.name: Bully
bully.description: Any players who vote differently to you might die.
bully.first_night_desc: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.
bully.other_night_desc: The Casanova picks a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

dowager.name: Dowager
dowager.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon sees the Grimoire.
dowager.first_night_desc: If the Dowager died show the demon the Grimoire.
dowager.other_night_desc: If the Dowager died show the demon the Grimoire.

orphan.name: Orphan
orphan.description: If you are good & dead, the Demon only dies by execution if you voted.

tramp.name: Tramp
tramp.description: If there are any votes to execute you, you might be executed immediately.

charlatan.name: Charlatan
charlatan.description: At night, you become the alignment of the 1st player to be executed this game.

goldenchild.name: Golden Child
goldenchild.description: The 1st player to nominate you, turns evil that night. You cannot nominate yourself.
goldenchild.other_night_desc: If a player nominated the Golden Child for the first time, change their alignment to evil.

hermit.name: Hermit
hermit.description: You have the ability of every other outsider. No Outsider modification effects work. [No other outsiders]

princess.name: Princess
princess.description: If a player dies, then claims to be the Princess (you must), 1 player may choose to die instead. If they are evil, your team loses.

prisoner.name: Prisoner
prisoner.description: You cannot vote. You start knowing 1 not-in-play character. If most players vote to free you, you become that character and that character's alignment.

vatdweller.name: Vat Dweller
vatdweller.description: On your 1st night, choose an Outsider. Every Outsider is a copy of that Outsider. [-? to +? Outsiders]

klaun.name: Klaun
klaun.description: Each night, choose up to 3 players. They are told that they are mad in some way, but are not.
klaun.first_night_desc: The Klaun points to 3 players, mark those players as 'mad' then wake them and inform them they are mad of some character.

familiar.name: Familiar
familiar.description: Each night*, you wake with the Demon and choose a player: they die. If you die, the demon loses its ability.
familiar.other_night_desc: Wake the familiar and Demon up at the same time. The familiar points as a player, mark them as 'dead'.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, your wish may have a price, and leaves a clue to its nature.

ringmaster.name: Ringmaster
ringmaster.description: Once per game, choose to become the Storyteller, and the previous storyteller becomes a co-storyteller. You may still vote. Decisions involving the death of more than one character must be approved by both storytellers. If you are caught cheating something bad might happen.
ringmaster.first_night_desc: Ask the Ringmaster if they want to become storyteller.

amaniti.name: Amaniti
amaniti.description: Your neighbours falsely register to good players' abilities.

senator.name: Senator
senator.description: Players can only nominate their living neighbors, even if you are dead.

scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
scarecrow.description: To good players, you register as a Demon & the Demon registers as a Minion.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.description: You may choose to open your eyes at night. You wake when other evil players do.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: You poison and gain the ability of the 1st in-play character that you are mad about being each day until the next dawn.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.description: You have the ability of an in-play Minion. If no others exist, you start by choosing a Minion: gain their ability.

riddlefiend.name: Riddle Fiend
riddlefiend.description: On the final day, even if you are dead, each alive player publicly guesses who you are. If no good players do, evil wins.

gorgon.name: Gorgon
gorgon.description: Each night, choose a player: if they leave their seat tomorrow, they die. Lose this ability when 3 or fewer players live.
gorgon.first_night_desc: The Gorgon chooses a player, mark them with gorgon_chosen.
gorgon.other_night_desc: The Gorgon chooses a player, mark them with gorgon_chosen.

daughterofnox.name: Daughter of Nox
daughterofnox.description: Good's info is reversed. The 1st time each player names you: lose your ability (if they are good), regain it (if they are evil).

sicilian.name: Sicilian
sicilian.description: When nominations are called, if you publicly choose a player (not yourself) & they are not executed today, their team wins.

zodion.name: Zodion
zodion.description: You start knowing all not-in-play characters. Each night*, the highest character on the script dies.
zodion.first_night_desc: Show the Zodion all not in play characters.

shacklewight.name: Shacklewight
shacklewight.description: Each night, choose any players: they all wake together. Tomorrow day, if 1 dies, they all die. Each day, if no-one dies, evil wins.
shacklewight.first_night_desc: The Shacklewight chooses any players, mark them as 'chosen'. Wake all marked players at the same time.
shacklewight.other_night_desc: The Shacklewight chooses any players, mark them as 'chosen'. Wake all marked players at the same time.

virilus.name: Virilus
virilus.description: Each night, choose a player to infect. Infected who nominate die & infect the nominee. After day 4, evil wins.
virilus.first_night_desc: The Virilus chooses a player, mark them with 'chosen'.
virilus.other_night_desc: The Virilus chooses a player, mark them with 'chosen'.

soulhammer.name: Soul Hammer
soulhammer.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. After the final night, the dead may not talk to the living.

creepingterror.name: Creeping Terror
creepingterror.description: Each night*, mark up to 3 players or kill all marked players. Marked players learn that they are marked.
creepingterror.other_night_desc: Creeping Terror chooses up to 3 players to mark or chooses to kill marked players.

barrowfog.name: Barrow-Fog
barrowfog.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Players killed by the Barrow-Fog register as alive during the day.
barrowfog.other_night_desc: Barrow-Fog chooses a player, mark them as dead with a reminder token, but not on their token.

palabradedios.name: Palabra de Dios
palabradedios.description: Each night*, each alive good player that raised a hand at dusk, kills a random player. If none did, evil wins.
palabradedios.other_night_desc: Kill a player for everyone that raised their hands.

lecadeau.name: Le Cadeau
lecadeau.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Townsfolk to nominate you becomes an evil Le Cadeau & you die tonight.
lecadeau.other_night_desc: If a townsfolk nominated the Le Cadeau for the first time they become an evil Le Cadeau, and the previous dies. The Le Cadeau chooses a player, they die.

queenoflies.name: Queen of Lies
queenoflies.description: Each night* choose 3 players to dupe: each chooses a different alive player, 2 of which die. All players learn at dawn who you duped.
queenoflies.other_night_desc: The Queen of Lies choses 3 players, mark them as 'duped'. Wake each player and have them choose another player, they die.

dolomite.name: Dolomite
dolomite.description: Each night*, choose a player: they turn evil & learn who you are. Once per game, you lose this ability. [No Minions]
dolomite.other_night_desc: The Dolomite chooses a player, change their alignment to Evil and inform them. Decide if the Dolomite loses their ability.

tipitipi.name: Tipi-Tipi
tipitipi.description: Each night*, a player dies. On the final night, choose a player. They are 'mad' that you are not the demon or their team loses.
tipitipi.other_night_desc: The Tipi-Tipi chooses a player, If this is the final night they are mad, otherwise they die.

hwisp.name: Hwisp
hwisp.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If nominated by a Townsfolk, you die. 2nd Townsfolk to nominate in a day's, team loses.
hwisp.other_night_desc: The Hwisp chooses a player, they die.

jnak.name: J'nak
jnak.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die. 1 good player knows you are 1 of 2 players. If executed while a minion lives, your team wins.
jnak.first_night_desc: Choose a player to know the J'nak, mark them with 'knows' and another who is their red herring. Wake the 'knows' player and show them both the J'nak and the red herring.
jnak.other_night_desc: The J'nak chooses a player, they die.

fanzazz.name: Fanzazz
fanzazz.description: Each night*, choose a player: they die & you become their alignment. If you die, your team loses. If only 2 players live, your team wins.
fanzazz.other_night_desc: The Fanzazz chooses a player, they die. Inform the Fanzazz if they changed alignment.

pall.name: Pall
pall.description: All players start dead. Dead players may nominate and vote and if executed, are reborn even if you are dead. Each night*, choose a player: they are reborn. If all evils live, evil wins, if you are executed and die, your team loses.
pall.other_night_desc: The Pall choses a player, they are reborn.

sissaphyth.name: Sissaphyth
sissaphyth.description: At night, if all Minions are dead, choose a Demon: become it, acting twice each night.
sissaphyth.first_night_desc: If all minions are dead, let the Sissaphyth choose a demon to become.
sissaphyth.other_night_desc: If all minions are dead, let the Sissaphyth choose a demon to become.
